name: Altar Guardian
description: A long time ago ancient people built altars that should defend the humanity from evil. But ancient creature right from hell could weaken its force.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: it got a bug on the first stage the 10/10 boss won't appear!
